Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 39th overall pick, by Texas in 1986...
Released by Texas on 3/2/1986...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago (N) on 3/2/1986 to a minor league deal...
Traded from Chicago (N) to Chicago (A) on 7/31/1986 (Going to CHC: RF M. Young. Going to CHW: P R. Dibble, P A. Ashby, P T. Ferreira, SS W. Weiss, C N. Santovenia)...
Traded from Chicago (A) to New York (N) on 5/12/1989 (Going to NYM: P A. Ashby. Going to CHW: P C. Bosio, P D. Spillner)...
Injured on 7/27/1989 with a Ruptured Tricep Tendon, out for 7 weeks...
Injured on 4/20/1990 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 6 days...
Injured on 4/26/1991 with a Bone Chips Elbow, out for 6 weeks...
Earned first career win on 4/9/1992...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 9/1/1993, going 5-0, 1.75...
Was selected to the 1994 Allstar game...
